```js
<script src="https://unpkg.com/vue@next"></script>
```

```js
npm install vue@next
```

```js
yarn global add @vue/cli@next
```

```js
npm install -g @vue/cli@next
```

```js
vue upgrade –-next
```

```js
$ npm init vite-app <project-name>
$ cd <project-name>
$ npm install
$ npm run dev
```

```js
$ yarn create vite-app <project-name>
$ cd <project-name>
$ yarn
$ yarn dev
```
